programme.title: General Douglas MacArthur and the Japanese surrender
programme.short_synopsis: A recollection of the end of the conflict in the Pacific during the Second World War.
programme.medium_synopsis: The 40th anniversary of the surrender of the Japanese at the end of the Second World War, the devastating hurricane in Galveston, Texas, and a profile of General Douglas MacArthur.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
